item.description:
Maddy’s Lounge
1639 Broadway
Rte 1 so/ Rte 99
Saugus, MA

1st Saturday of Every Month:

All Ladies T-Dance from 3:00pm - 8:00 pm with D.J Tracy.

We also have THE NEW POSSIBILITIES (All GIRL Band) performing starting at 5:00 pm The New Possibilities is a Boston-based, all-female cover band playing a variety of current alternative rock/pop songs, along with classic tunes from the 80's and 90's. ALSO they are one of the TOP 5 groups that have been chosen out of many numerous bands to play this Halloween at none other than Witch City itself. http://www.thenewposs...


To be followed by:

The Hide Away
@ Anthony's,
105 Canal St
Malden, MA 02148
8:00 pm to 1:30 am

Special Guest DJ Jodi from Ogunquit will be mixing her R&B, LATIN and TOP 40 Music all night long.

• Free Parking
• 21+, Proper I.D. required
• Plenty of seating
• Great FOOD
• HUGE dance floor
• Fully stocked Bar
• KENO
• $7.00 cover charge

Any questions email BlushBoston@yahoo.com

or www.BlushBoston.com
item.name: ALL LADIES T-DANCE
